#### goldeneyes05

Do you ever take a break? Seems like you're always doing something.

#### Brandon Sanderson

Went out to dinner with my wife for our anniversary last night. Does that count? The truth is, I love what I do. So if I have time when Iâ€™m not doing something else, I work on books.
